p: The weakest tested oils worked on strain 71/IV (Table 3) which was resistant to all antibiotics used (Table 2). The most effective was marjoram essential oil (MIC: 0.5–1 μl/ml); thyme oil and oregano (MIC: 1 μl/ml) were less effective. MIC values were obtained for strain 48/IV (marjoram oil—MIC: 0.25 μl/ml, thyme oil and oregano—MIC: 1 μl/ml) (Table 3).
